data.title: California Cannabis Track-and-Trace/METRC System Workshops for Licensees
data.excerpt: We invite you to join us at one of our upcoming California Cannabis Track-and-Trace (CCTT-METRC) System workshops for an advanced overview of the CCTT-METRC system being used statewide to record inventory and movement of cannabis and cannabis products throughout the commercial cannabis supply chain–from cultivation to sale.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California Department of Food and Agriculture
